channel.title: Steamcommunity.com - Stats not correct
channel.description:
I used to have about 4500 Kills/2000 Deaths as Axis Sniper in Day Of Defeat: Source, but when I checked my stats a couple of days ago, those were deleted and my best stats are now 1400 Kills/940 Deaths as Axis Support. The Achievements are all still there, but the whole class/weapons statistic is messed up.
Same goes for Team Fortress 2. Acording to the Steamcommunity, I had 3 Assists as Engineer, 1 Defense as Soldier and 2 Dominations as Heavy, but in-game it is correctly displayed (5 Assists, 2 Defenses and 2 Dominations, all as Sniper).
Does someone else have this problem and/or has Valve stated a reason for this?

item.title: Steamcommunity.com - Stats not correct
item.dc:creator: Imonfire
item.description:
They’re the same as TF2. Or really similar (makes ages since I have played it).

Read full topic

Read full topic
